versionA.text: Twenty-two stroke patients performed a maze task. The mean number of trials for success was 17.3. If the population mean (Î¼) for this task is 8.2, what is the calculated value for t?

versionB.text: Twenty-two stroke patients performed a maze task. The mean number of trials for success was 17.3. If the standard deviation (s) is 6.2, what is the calculated value for t?
